::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(bggjphd)
theme_set(theme_bggj())
```
:::


For my PhD modeling I needed to fetch a large amount of data from the CEDA Archive, specifically [UKCP Local Projections on a 5km grid over the UK for 1980-2080](https://catalogue.ceda.ac.uk/uuid/e304987739e04cdc960598fa5e4439d0).

![Screenshot of the data page](Figures/ceda_data.png)
